name: Drumstick Shootin Arcade
description:
A simple remix on the classic shootin em' up game genre. Get points by shooting hot-sauce capsules at chicken drumsticks that are moving across the table. But make sure to not shoot the occasional drumstick bone that comes around. Otherwise, it will be game over!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Game Controls
  • X/(Left-Mouse Click) --- Shoot a Projectile at the Chicken Drumstick
  • (Right-Arrow Key)/(Right-Mouse Click) --- Skipped the Current Hotsauce Chicken and move to the next one in the line

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Version Control

-------------------------

Future Version
  • In-Built Interactive Tutorial
  • Additional Modes (Easy, Medium, Hard)
  • Unlockable Prizes for finishing the game

-------------------------

Version 1.0 
  • Initial Game is released
